short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create engaging comments on social media, powered by AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to help users generate engaging, accurate, and grammatically correct comments for social media posts. Powered by the Gemini API, it ensures that every comment is contextually relevant and error-free, making your interactions on social media more professional and effective.

Key Features:

Engaging Comments: Generate thoughtful and contextually appropriate comments tailored to different social media platforms.
100% Correct Spelling: The extension uses advanced language processing tools to ensure that your comments are free from spelling and grammatical errors.
User Review: We recommend that you review each generated comment before posting to ensure it aligns with your voice and the specific context of the post.
Whether you're trying to build your professional network, engage in discussions, or make your social media interactions more meaningful, this extension takes the hassle out of creating perfect comments.

Important Reminder: Always review the generated comments before posting them on your social media. While the extension aims to provide helpful suggestions, the final responsibility for the content you post lies with you.
